verses.content: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a:
“Mihriem naupa, Nuhmei pahni, nu pakhat naunuhmeihai chu an um a;
Aiguptaa chun nawchizawr sin an thawh a, an tleirâwla inthawkin nawchizawr sin chu an thaw a na, an nênehai chu hmet a na, chuongchun, an nunghâk inthiengna nêne chu hmet zêk a na.

An hminghai chu, a upa lem chu Ohola a na, a sangnu chu Oholiba a nih; ka ta an hung ni a, naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai an hung nei tah a. Chun, an hming thua chun Ohola chu Samaria a na, Oholiba chu Jerusalem chu a nih.
Chun, Ohola chun ka ta a ni sûng khawm chun nawchi a zawr a; a dit zâwnghai a tuolbâwm Assuria mihai ân saipuia,
a dum pâwla incheihai, ram awp- tuhai le rorêltuhai le tlangvâl ditumtak tak sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai chu.
An kuoma chun a nawchizawrna chu a pêk a, an rêng chun Assuria mi ditumtak takhai an na, chun, tukhawm ân saipui taphawthai chu, an milimhaia chun ama chu ân suk- pawrche ve pei tah a.

Aiguptaa umna nihaia inthawk ta khan a nawchizawr chu a ma nawh a, a tleirâwl lai an lo zâlpui a; a nunghâk inthieng nêne hmûrhai chu an lo sukhliem ta sih a; chuongchun, an hurna chu a chunga chun an lo bunthlâk tah a.
Chuleichun, a hmangaihai kut- ah, a însaipui Assuria mihai kuta chun ka pêk suok tah a.

Chuonghai chun a saruokna chu an hlîmpêk a, a naupasalhai le a naunuhmeihai chu an lâkpêk a; ama le chun kâwlhnâmin an that a, ama chu nuhmeihai laia ṭawngnaa hmang a lo ni tah a, ama chunga chun rorêlna chu an lo sukthlûk ta sih a.

“Chun, a unaunu Oholiba khawm chun hi hi a hmu zing a, anachu, ama chu a mi insaipuinaa chun ama nêk hin nasatakin ân suksiet lemin, a nawchizawrnaa khawm chun a unau- nu nawchizawrna nêkin a nasa lem a.
Ama chun Assuria mihai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, a tuolbâwmhai chu, ropuitaka incheihai, sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai, an rênga tlangvâl ditum- tak takhai chu ân saipui a.
Chun, ama chu an sukpawrche ti ka hmuh a, an pahni chun lampui thuhmun an hraw leiin.
Chun, a nawchizawrna chu a sukzuol pei a, bang chunga chun mihriemhai lim zieka umhai chu a hmu sih a; Kaldaihai lim sen mawia incheia ziek,
an kâwnghaia kâwngkhitnaa inkhit an luhaia lukâwm sukdum kâwma, hang en khawma lalhai ang, an piengna rama Kaldaia Babulon mi nina nei chie ruok an nih.
Chun, a hmu phingle chun ama chun ân saipui a; Kaldaia chun an kuomah mitirhai a tir a.
Chun, Babulon mi chu a kuoma inditna khuma chun a hung a, an nawchizawrna chun ama chu an sukpawrche a, anni le chun a lo pawr- che tah a, a lungril chun anni chu a ngei ta hle a.
Chuongchun, a nawchizawrna chu langchangtaka a thaw a, a saruokna a hlîm chun, ka lungril chu amaa inthawk chun ân her a, a unaunua inthawka ka lungril a lo inher ta ang bawk khan.
Nisienlakhawm, Aigupta rama nawchizawr thil a thaw lai, a tleirâwl lai nihai chu hre zingin, a hurnahai chu a la belsa ta rawp a.
An tisa khawm sabengtunghai tisa ang, an thilsuok khawm sakawr- hai thilsuok ang, an mi lepchiehai chu ân saipui a.
Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i tleirâwl lai nênehai an hmeta, a hmûrhai an hmet zêk lai a, i tleirâwl- lai hurna chu i ngai a.
“Chuleiin, Oholiba, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, i dit zâwnghai chu i chungah hung inṭuongtir ka ta; i lungrilin a hran- sanhai chu, sîr tina chun i chungah inhungtir ka tih;

Babulon mihai, Kaldai mihai po po le, Pekod mihai, Soa mihai, Hoa mihai, anni le Assuria mihai po po leh; tlangvâl ditumtak takhai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, an rêngin lal nauhai, mi hming inthanghai, an rêngin sakawr chunga chuong mihai chu.

Chun, nanga chunga chun hriemhreihai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, tawlailîrhai, mipui inkhâwm nasa- tak leh hung do an ti cheh a; a vêlin, thîr lukhumhai, âwmphawhai le phawhai leh an hung ep ding che a nih; chun, an kuoma chun rorêlna dân ang peiin i chungah rorêlpêk an ti che.

I chunga chun ka îtthîkna chu sieng ka ta, i chunga chun lunginsen pumin thâwng an tih; i hnâr le i nahai chu la hmang an ta; i la mahlahai chu kâwlhnâmah tlûng an tih; i naupa- salhai, i naunuhmeihai chu lâng an ta, i la mahlahai chu meiin kâng hmang vawng a tih.
Chun, nang khawm i silfênhai chu hlîppêk an ti cheh a, în cheina man tamhai chu la hmang an tih.

Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i nawchizawrna hung lâk le, i hurna chu nangmaa inthawka bo ta dingin siem ka ta; chuongchun, anni chu i mithai chun mel ta ngai naw nih a, Aigupta chu hre zing ta bawk naw ti nih.
Hieng hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun a ti sih a: Ngai ta, i theidahai kuta le, i lungrilin a hransanhai kuta chun ka pêk suok ding che a nih;
theida hlêng an ti cheh a, i sinthaw inrimna po po chu la hmang vawng an ta, saruok le silfên boin mâksan an ti che; chun, i hurna saruokna chu hlîm nîng a ta, i hurna le i nawchizawrna chu.
Hieng thilhai hi i chungah thawin a um ding a nih; khawhri be mihai hnung chu châkin i lo hnawt tah a, an milimhai chun i lo insuk- pawrche ta si leiin.
I unaunu lampuia chun i lo fe tah a; chuleiin, ama no chu i kutah ka pêk ding a nih.
“Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: I unaunu no tung lientak chu i dâwn ding a nih, Hmusita nuisanin um i ta, hrilinsîm ni bawk i tih, A keng râwn hle sih a;
Lungngaina le inruinain sip tâng i ta, Râusanna le maktina no, i zuorpuinu Samaria no le chun Dâwn khawm dâwn ngei i ta, thlâksuok i ta,
Chutaka a nâwihai chu, sawi i ta, I nênehai chu sukhliem i tih; Ka lo hril ta sih a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
“Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Kei i mi lo theinghil tah a, i hnungah i mi pei tah a, chuleiin, i hurna le i nawchizawr- nahai chu nangin phur rawh,” tiin.
Chu nawa khawm chun LALPA chun ka kuomah a hril a, “Mihriem naupa, Ohola le Oholiba chungthu hi i rêl ding am? an tirdakumnahai chu anni hril la.

An lo uire ta sih a, an kuthaia chun thisen a kai a; an milimhai chun uiretna thil chu an lo thaw tah a; chun, an naupasalhai an mi neipêk- hai khawm chu, an kuomah fâk zoa um dingin meia chun an infethleng- tir a.
Chu naw khawm chu hi hi ka chungah an thaw bawk a; a ni pâng- ngaia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu an sukpawrcheh a, ka châwlnihai khawm chu an lo bawsiet tah a.
An milimhai kuoma an nauhai an that laiin, chu nia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrche dingin an hung sih a; chun, ngai ta, ka in sûnga chun chuong ang chun an thaw a nih.

Chu nawa chun, hlataka in- thawka hung ding mihai ta ding chun mi i tir a, an kuoma chun mitir chu tir a na; chun, ngai ta, an hung tah a; chuong ta ding chun în sâwp a, i mithai i nâl a, incheinahaiin în chei a;
lal khum a hmaa dawkân buot- saia um chunga chun i ṭhung a, chu chunga chun ka riminhnikhai le ka hriek chu i sie kha.

Chun, mipui râwl inhawitihai chu a kuoma chun a um a; chun, mi chi narânhai le chun thlalêra in- thawkin zu inrui mihai chu hung ṭhuoi an na. An kuthaia chun bân- bunhai chu a thuoin an inbuntir a, an luhai chunga chun lallukhum mawi- takhai le chun.
Chun, kei chun uirea a upa lemnu kuoma chun, ‘Tuhin anni chun ama le uiretna thil chu an thawin, ama khawma anni leh a thaw ding am aw?’ ka tih a.
Nuhmei nawchizawr hlak kuoma an lût hlak angin, anni chu ama kuoma chun an lût tah a; chuongchun, nuhmei hur, Ohola le Oholiba kuoma chun an lût tah a.
Mi felhai chun, anni chu uirenu chunga rorêl ang le, nuhmei thisen insuotu chunga rorêl angin rorêlpêk an tih; uirenuhai an na, an kutahai chun thisen a kai bawk si leiin.
Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti sih a; An chungah mipui in- khâwm hung ṭhuoi ka ta, anni chu a suk a tunga vawrlênga suksiet dingin an kuomah pêng ka tih.
Chun, mipui inkhâwmhai chun anni chu lungin dêng an ta; an kâwl- hnâmhai chun that an ta; an naupa- salhai le an naunuhmeihai chu that an ta, an inhai chu meiin raw hâwp an tih.
Chuongchun, hurna chu chu rama inthawka bo dingin siem ka ta, nuhmeihai po po chu in hurna ang thaw lo dinga inchûktir an ni theina dingin.
Chun, in hurna chu in chungah thung an ti cheu a, in milimhai suolna chu phur in ta, chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih,” tiin.
